meanings.definition: A place, person, or thing from which something comes or can be obtained.
meanings.sent1: My teacher told us to use at least three sources for our research project.
meanings.sent2: The library is a great source of information for students.
meanings.sent3: I asked my dog to be my source of inspiration, but all he did was nap.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a source of light in the darkness of the room.
meanings.sent5: The fountain was a never-ending source of joy for the children playing nearby.

meanings.definition: The point of origin or creation.
meanings.sent1: The scientist wanted to trace the sources of the mysterious virus.
meanings.sent2: The artist's studio was the source of many beautiful paintings.
meanings.sent3: The source of the magic potion turned out to be a mischievous fairy.
meanings.sent4: His passion for music was the source of his creativity.
meanings.sent5: The ancient tree was believed to be the source of all life in the forest.
